name: coupon-3
effect: One of three coupons needed to receive a Pokétch.
short_effect: The last of three tickets used to obtain a Pokétch.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.
flavor_text.platinum: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.
